h2_title: Stone Monkey Boss Fight and Guide
content: The final part of this move is typically an even larger orb of fire will be thrown your way. This will mean that you can't spend all your time as close to them as possible, and will need to dip back at times to easily avoid these attacks.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'The_Stone_Monkey.md', within the main section titled 'The Stone Monkey', specifically from the subsection 'Stone Monkey Boss Fight and Guide' and the sub-subsection 'Stone Monkey Phase Two'.
The content is as follows:
The final part of this move is typically an even larger orb of fire will be thrown your way. This will mean that you can't spend all your time as close to them as possible, and will need to dip back at times to easily avoid these attacks.
